title:
3D $\mathcal{N}=1$ supergravity from Virasoro TQFT: Gravitational
  partition function and Out-of-time-order correlator
authors: Arpan Bhattacharyya, Saptaswa Ghosh, Poulami Nandi, Sounak Pal
abstract:
In this paper, we compute the partition functions of $\mathcal{N}=1$ SUGRA
for different boundary topologies, i.e. sphere and torus, using super-Virasoro
TQFT. We use fusion and modular kernels of the super-Liouville theory to
compute the necklace-channel conformal block and showcase formalism by proving
that the inner product holds for superconformal blocks, defined as states in
the Hilbert space. Finally, we compute the out-of-time-order correlator for the
torus topology with superconformal primary insertions as matter using the tools
of super-Virasoro TQFT and investigate its early-time behaviour.
